Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: L. Marcus
Reviews.Content: I love pebl phones.  Works just great like the other Pebls we have. We have had several since I seem to drop them in the pool once in awhile.

Reviews.Title: A pebl for your thoughts ?
Reviews.Author: Ajo
Reviews.Content: Thinking about buying a Pebl? Don't hesitate .  If you are looking for a good carry phone that is solid , has good voice quality , takes pictures fairly well , and will hold a couple of mp3 tunes this could be the one for you. This is not a champion multi-media phone but it will handle your light work. It is solidly constructed and I actually liked the rubber finish. It's an older model so the U.I. is a bit dated don't let that scare you. If you just need a basic phone that has a few tricks up it's sleeve you may just get a Pebl for your thoughts.
